author: felixweber
title: NFT Guild
description: There is a friction of the CNFT Space & Project Catalyst. A lack of communication and collaborations forces us to build silos.
solution: Provide community events with Focus on NFT Creators and Markeplaces where ideas can find a common place to meet and to connect with Catalyst
experience: NFT Creators and Toolmakers, SPOs, well connected CNFT Community members, Funded Proposers and Community Advisors, Cardano Ambassadors
